result.formatted_address: 10/F, Bartlock Centre, 3 Yiu Wa Street, Causeway Bay, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
result.name: Sijie Sichuan Restaurant

reviews.text: Good food, not worth the hype. We have had better in other major cities including New York and LA. The spice level was just not there. The fish dish was the best, very similar to others we have had.
Consistently good every time. Definitely one of the best Sichuan restaurant in HK. Every dish is well balanced with flavour and spiciness. Great value too.

Really good down to earth Sichuan cuisine. Properly spicy and not much if a concession to more delicate palettes. Small place on the 10 floor of a seedy office building which now has restaurants on each floor.
A set dinner menu is HKD 350 per head but you need a minimum of 2 persons. A bit on the pricey side for such a dive. But I think the food is on par with the price so all is fair.
Beer is always a good bet, especially when you need something urgently to rescue your tongue from a bite that is too spicy.
Reservation is essential. But expect a very crowed room.
Sijie I began visit since it started business more than ten years ago. Authentic  Sichuen spicy food. Reliable and no fancy.
Good service and menu. Not very spicy at all, apart from a few specific dishes. Price a bit on the high side.

result.formatted_address: 10/F, Bartlock Centre, 3 Yiu Wa Street, Causeway Bay, Causeway Bay, 香港
result.name: 四姐川菜

reviews.text:
無下次😫
每位340不包飲品，4位可選3個前菜4個主菜，但最期待嘅水煮魚好失望，竟然最基本嘅鯇魚或大魚都無，會用魚柳整水煮魚😫口感極差，唯有涼拌麵較為好吃，最差嘅嘅除左水煮魚就係服務極差😤😤
